wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongLightComponent
        • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent
          • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable

    public class BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent
extends BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a spot light source.
    See Also:
    GameObject

    • Method Detail

      • getCutoff

        public float getCutoff()
        Returns the cutoff component.
        Returns:
        cutoff component (in degrees)

      • setCutoff

        public void setCutoff(float cutoff)
        Sets the cutoff component to the given value. Note that the ccutoff component must be higher than 0 and lower than the outer cutoff component.
        Parameters:
        cutoff - cutoff component (in degrees)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - cutoff component must be higher than 0 and lower than the outer cutoff component

      • getOuterCutoff

        public float getOuterCutoff()
        Returns the outer cutoff component.
        Returns:
        outer cutoff component (in degrees)

      • setOuterCutoff

        public void setOuterCutoff(float outerCutoff)
        Sets the outer cutoff component to the given value. Note that the outer cutoff component must be higher than the cutoff component.
        Parameters:
        outerCutoff - outer cutoff component (in degrees)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - outer cutoff component must be higher than the cutoff component

      • computeLightParameters

        @Internal
 @NotNull
protected java.nio.FloatBuffer computeLightParameters()
        Description copied from class: BlinnPhongLightComponent
        Creates a FloatBuffer which contains all the light's parameters like diffuse color, position etc. The FloatBuffer's content must follow the memory layout of the shader's light struct.
        Specified by:
        computeLightParameters in class BlinnPhongLightComponent
        Returns:
        the light's parameters

        Sets the light transform related parameters like direction or position.
